quest.name: Lessons in Love
journal:
Lisette de Valentione requires help with a matter close to her heart.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.

Valentione's Day, that celebration of ardor and affection, is come to Eorzea once more, and the indomitable Lisette de Valentione has returned to spread the message of love across the land. This year, she and her crew are collaborating with the Sanctum of the Twelve to deliver an all-new experience in matchmaking, and she cordially invites you to participate before seamlessly transitioning into a request. She asks that you lend a hand to a trainee named Astrid, whom she worries is too sober and rational to discharge her duties. If you have a mind to oblige, you will find the girl nearby at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.

A few sentences into your acquaintance, Astrid reveals that her preparation for the affinity test has stalled. The three moogles tasked with setting up the venue have abandoned their work, and at this rate the event cannot begin. It falls to you to seek out the moogles and discover the reason behind their untimely desertion.

You speak with each of the moogles in turn, and they all blame their lack of motivation on Astrid's affinity test, which they complain is “stiff and dry,” “all remonstrance and no romance,” and “dull and uninspired.” Yet in spite of their insistence─or perhaps because of it─you cannot shake the sense that laziness is also a factor. Thus informed, you turn your steps back to Astrid.

Astrid is distraught to learn that her affinity test is looked upon so unfavorably by her own helpers. Nevertheless, she is determined to rectify the issues raised and make the test fit for public enjoyment. Here, Hortefense shamelessly maneuvers himself into the conversation and suggests that you turn to a moogle for advice. Though loath to accept any sort of help from her brother-in-law, Astrid concedes that he speaks true, and together you set off to find Kuplu Kumu, the leader of the Sanctum choir.

Upon being apprised of the situation, Kuplu Kumu confesses that he had anticipated a problem with the affinity test. Whereas Astrid attempted to bring tangibility to love, love is anything but tangible. From the moogle's words, Astrid comes to understand that what her test needs is a dose of fun. While she and Kuplu Kumu discuss ways to improve it, you are tasked with rounding up the three lazy moogles. They are like to be found over by the Leatherworkers' Guild, their preferred place for being unproductive.
Though initially uncooperative, the moogles respond well to your magic words. Together they flutter off back to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre, and you follow in their wingbeats.

Astrid happily reports that, thanks to Kuplu Kumu's input, her affinity test has been brought up to acceptable standards of fun. Furthermore, the three moogles have returned and promptly completed their work on the venue. All that remains, then, is to have a couple actually trial the test, henceforth known as the Valentione's Ceremony, and Astrid would have you and your chosen partner do the honors. When you are ready, the House Valentione servant will escort you to the venue. At the ceremony's conclusion, you will receive a Valentione's Day chocolate, which Astrid bids you bring to her.

The trial ceremony is concluded, and you return to Astrid with the Valentione's Day chocolate. Satisfied with the results, she declares the ceremony ready to be opened to the public. Offering you her heartfelt thanks, Astrid assures you that she will be fine from here on. Your work is done; time to report back to Lisette.

Lisette is pleased to hear that all has gone well with her little sister, whom she wishes to be independent. And when Astrid returns with news of the ceremony's positive reception, Lisette takes the opportunity to declare her traineeship complete. Astrid's experiences this day will doubtless make her into a fine emissary, and you take pride in the knowledge that you were a part of her journey. May she succeed in her mission to till the fields of love within people's hearts.
objectives: Complete the Valentione's Ceremony and show the Valentione's Day chocolate to Astrid.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Greetings, adventurer. Are you a lonely soul yearning for affection, or blissfully bonded to your beloved? Mayhap somewhere in between, or nowhere at all? Well, however you should identify, I, Lisette de Valentione, wish you all the blessings of love this Valentione's Day!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: ...Oh, 'tis you, dear friend! You have grown even more fetching since last we met, it took me a moment to recognize you. I am not surprised that fate should reunite us so, yet know that I am no less pleased for it.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: As you can see, the festivities are in full swing. Would that my esteemed ancestor, Lady Arabelle, could be here to witness the fruits of her legacy. A legacy born of the simplest of truths: all are deserving of ardor and affection.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: To ensure that her spirit lives on, my faithful retainers and I have journeyed forth from frosty Ishgard, that we might instill hearts the realm over with the warmth of truest love.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: And this year, I am proud to say that we have joined hands with the Sanctum of the Twelve, those purveyors of eternal love─a union forged in the very heavens!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: For our inaugural collaboration, we are offering couples the chance to test their affinity for one another. I cordially invite you to participate with the object of your ardor and affection!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: ...And here is where I send most people on their way. But you are not most people. Nay, for a capable adventurer such as you, I have a special request.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: You see, this year I've brought a trainee to help with the event, but she herself would benefit from some help.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Her name is Astrid, and she is a little bit too...sober. Too rational. Yet where love is concerned, there is no surer guide than one's heart. Is this not so?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: I should be grateful if you would watch over her and lend her a hand when necessary. Oh, and pray keep the fact that you act at my behest between us.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Remember, her name is Astrid. Pray watch over her and lend her a hand when necessary.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: Well met, my friend. I believe my lady fairest has tasked you with watching over Astrid.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: I myself tried to help the lass, but she was not welcoming of my assistance, and that is putting it rather mildly. I wish you better luck than I had.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh, what am I to do? Sister placed her faith in me. I can't afford to fail. But at this rate...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Eeeeeek! Er...I mean, if you're here for the affinity test, I'm afraid we aren't quite ready yet.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: No, wait. You're one of those adventurers, aren't you? Sister says that you and yours are ever willing to aid those in need. Well, I'm in direst need of aid right now!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: You see, I've been charged with devising and organizing a new affinity test for the Valentione's Day celebration, but there's been a little problem...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh, who am I fooling? It's a huge problem! The moogles tasked with setting up the venue have all abandoned me, muttering moogle profanities as they fluttered off.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I know not what I did to offend them. I only wished to do my part for the event─for love.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I'm at a loss, adventurer. I beg you, find the moogles for me. And when you do, ask them what caused them to leave.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Please hurry and find the moogles for me. And when you do, ask them what caused them to leave.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: Ahhh, this is more like it. Working too much─no, working at all is bad for the heart. Sometimes you just have to say, “Bugger this, I'm going home!”

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: ...Uwaaah! Wh-What is it, kupo!?

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: Astrid wants to know why we up and left? First things first: lest there be any misunderstandings, what I said just now was─ahem─just a jest. We're definitely not being slack, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: On the contrary, we care about the event. A lot. So when we saw what was being planned for the affinity test, well, we simply couldn't abide by it. It's all so stiff and dry, cracks are like to form between couples, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: We wanted no part of that, and that's why we left. You can say as much to Astrid, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEB03082
dialogue.text: <munch> <munch> Mmmmmm, if there's one thing that tastes better than kupo nuts you've earned, it's kupo nuts you haven't earned.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEB03082
dialogue.text: ...Hm? You need something, kupo?

dialogue.name: MOOGLEB03082
dialogue.text: Astrid sent you, did she? Doesn't understand why we abandoned her? Well, the reason's quite complicated, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEB03082
dialogue.text: We moogles were working hard. No, really─we were toiling our little wings off in the name of eternal love. But we had no confidence in Astrid's affinity test, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEB03082
dialogue.text: No, her approach was all remonstrance and no romance. You can't expect couples to get in the mood for love that way, nor us to get in the mood for work. I'm motivationally challenged as it is, and this didn't help matters, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEC03082
dialogue.text: <sigh> Is there a finer feeling than taking a nap while people around you work? Look at the poor fools, scurrying about, day in and day out. All that vain effort makes me want to laugh, kupohoho... Kupohohoho─!

dialogue.name: MOOGLEC03082
dialogue.text: ...Er, can I help you?

dialogue.name: MOOGLEC03082
dialogue.text: What, Astrid wishes to know why we abandoned our work? Why, it's because we couldn't be bothe─ahem, I mean, her affinity test is the problem, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEC03082
dialogue.text: It's so dull and uninspired, couples are liable to fall asleep on the spot. Now, I'm usually all for sleep, but even I know that isn't the time and place for it, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEC03082
dialogue.text:
Seeing this, we decided to leave. It's our way of protesting. And if we get to laze about in the bargain, well then, it's two birds with one stone!
...It's mostly about the protest, though. Make sure Astrid knows that, kupo.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: There you are! Were you able to find the moogles? What did they have to say?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: What? My affinity test...is to blame? But I poured my heart into it. That it should be so terrible as to drive our helpers away...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh, whatever should I do?

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Heed the moogles.

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Ignore the moogles.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: So you agree with the moogles' assessment, and I should try to address the issues they raised?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Yes... Yes! Sister has ever said that, wherever there is an obstacle to love, it falls to us to clear the way. And if my own test poses an obstacle, then by the Fury, I will improve it!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: So you think the moogles are simply making excuses for their laziness, and I should ignore their words? Even so, this gets us nowhere...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: ...Wait. You're testing my resolve, aren't you? Well, know that I shan't give up on love so easily! The moogles have the right of it, I can see that now. My affinity test is far from ideal, and by the Fury, I will improve it!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: So, um...how should I go about this? Let's see: there was “stiff and dry” and “all remonstrance and no romance” and “dull and uninspired.” There are so many issues, I'm not sure where to begin...

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: (-???-)Ahem! Pray forgive me, but I chanced to be passing by, and couldn't help but overhear your conversation.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Hmph, a likely story. As I've said a dozen times, Hortefense, your opinion is not needed. Scurry back to Sister.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: Now, now, is that any tone of voice to take with your brother-in-law? You must know that I only have your best interests at heart.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: But I am not one to overstay my welcome. I take my leave...and leave with our adventurer friend a piece of advice. For problems pertaining to moogles, one would do well to consult a moogle.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: He just can't help himself. Yet, loath though I am to admit it, he's right. It's best that we consult a moogle.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Kuplu Kumu is nearby. He's the leader of the Sanctum choir. Let us go and seek his advice.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: I know not why Astrid dislikes Hortefense so. He is far from perfect, to be sure, but the bad is far outweighed by the good.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: He is possessed of a good heart. And a handsome face. And a toned body. And I'd be remiss not to mention his skillful swordsmanship, and I speak not only of combat, mmmmmm...

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: <cough> <sputter> Y-You didn't hear any of that!

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: As you have witnessed, Astrid does not take kindly to my...existence. Prithee look after her in my stead.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: This is Kuplu Kumu. Let us ask him for his advice.

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: Well, if it isn't young Astrid. And I see you have brought a friend. Is there something you require, kupo?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Yes, Kuplu Kumu. I seek your counsel with regards to my affinity test.

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: I see, I see. Truth be told, I had anticipated such a problem, kupo.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: You did? <sigh> It seems everyone foresaw issues except me...

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: Do not be hard on yourself. You meant well in trying to bring tangibility to love. Yet love is anything but tangible, kupo. No, it transcends the rational, living in our hearts rather than our heads, assuming as many forms as there are couples. It is that which evokes fuzzy-wuzzy feelings of excitation and─and kupolation, kupo.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Excitation, I understand. Kupolation...not so much. But it's beginning to become clear to me now. What my affinity test needs is a dose of fun. And yet, fun has never been my forte. I'm afraid my definition of the word would fall flat with others.

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: Well, it just so happens that we moogles are the foremost authorities on fun and frivolity! I will help you, kupo!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Truly!? Thank you so much!

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: Now then, we must also do something about those three layabouts. Their indolent ways are well known to me. Even at the Sanctum, they find excuses to avoid work at every turn, kupo.

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: I suspect they have learned some bad habits from our sky-dwelling brethren. A spot of punishment wouldn't go astray, kupo.

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: Their behavior reflects poorly upon our kind and cannot be tolerated. A spot of punishment wouldn't go astray, kupo.

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: Adventurer, I will discuss how to improve the affinity test with Astrid. Meanwhile, will you go and round up the three moogles, kupo?

dialogue.name: KUPLUKUMU
dialogue.text: They will be over by the Leatherworkers' Guild, their preferred place for being unproductive. If you find them uncooperative, just say that you will squash their poms, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEB03082
dialogue.text: We're not being lazy, we're conserving our motivation. Should have enough saved up by tomorrow. No wait, make that next week. Safer to err on the side of conservative, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEC03082
dialogue.text: Work is for the weak, sleep is for the strong. You're strong like me, so you should understand this, kupo.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: The chief summoned us, you say!? But...we're busy at the moment. Yes, lots of dawdling and dallying to do. We'll go a little later, kupo.

dialogue.name: Q2
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Astrid means to take your advice.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Come right now, or I'll squash your poms.

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: Really? She took our advice to heart? Well then, we have work to do! Let's go, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: Nooo, not the pom! Anything but the pom! We'll go at once, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOOGLEA03082
dialogue.text: <pant> Never worked...so hard in my life... <pant> But it felt sort of good, kupo...

dialogue.name: MOOGLEB03082
dialogue.text: The chief threatened to withhold our kupo nuts for a month. A month! I...I did what I had to do, kupo... <sob>

dialogue.name: MOOGLEC03082
dialogue.text: My work is done, kupo... Now I shall slumber for all eternity... Zzzzzzzzz...

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Ah, there you are! I'm pleased to say that, with Kuplu Kumu's sage counsel, we've managed to bring the affinity test up to acceptable standards of fun!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Moreover, the three moogles returned and resumed setting up the venue. They worked with such enthusiasm, all was made ready in the blinking of an eye!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Kuplu Kumu tells me he cast an enchantment on them that bestows motivation. Such practical magicks the moogles have!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Now then, all that remains is to have a couple actually trial the affinity test.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Adventurer, I could not have come this far without your help. Would you and your chosen do the honor of being the first souls to undertake the Valentione's Ceremony?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Thank you! When you are ready, let the House Valentione servant yonder know, and you shall be escorted to the venue.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: At the ceremony's conclusion, you will receive a Valentione's Day chocolate. Be sure to return hither and show it to me.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You now have access to the Valentione's Ceremony seasonal instance! To enter the venue, speak with the House Valentione servant at Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Valentione's Ceremony is an instance designed for a party of two. There are no class, job, or level requirements for participation.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In the event that you register for the ceremony alone, your partner will be found via the matching system.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: You're back! Have...have you completed the ceremony?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: ...A Valentione's Day chocolate! Everything went smoothly, then? Excellent! With this, the ceremony is ready to be opened to the public!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: If truth be told, I shall be a nervous wreck until the festivities come to a close. But I have confidence that the ceremony will be a success. How could it not be, with the assistance I've received from you and the moogles both?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I shall be fine by myself from here on. Thank you, adventurer. For everything.

dialogue.name: HORTEFENSE
dialogue.text: Full glad am I to see that Astrid's efforts have borne fruit, and it was doubtless in no small part due to you. Allow me to offer you my heartfelt thanks.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: I have confidence that the ceremony will be a success. Thank you, adventurer. For everything.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Ah, welcome back, my friend. I understand you have been kept on your feet, but the road of love was ever a long and winding one. Now, pray do not keep me in suspense─tell me how Astrid fared.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Well, that's a godsdamned relief. Well-intentioned as she is, the girl can be a right pain in the arse. I'd say I'm sorry for subjecting you to her quirks, but I'm not. I knew you would guide her true, and I shall leave it at a thank you.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: ...What? Can't a woman let her mask slip from time to time? It's weary business, you know, this Valentione's Day thing.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: That's not why I thrust Astrid on you, though. No, I would've liked to help her myself, but I can't be there to prop her up forever. No, she needs to learn how to survive without me.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Though you ended up shouldering much of the burden, I reckon Astrid has learned a great deal from her experience. Given time, she'll make a fine emissary.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Sister, Sister! I have tidings!

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Sister? Who is this sister? My name is Lisette de Valentione, and my mission is to spread boundless love across the land!

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Oh...er, right! F-Forgive me, Lisette. If it please you, I wish to make a report on the affinity test.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: The people are participating in droves, and by all accounts, they are enjoying themselves tremendously. Full many couples are said to be departing the venue flush with excitement, love writ plain upon their faces.

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Well, I believe we may declare the event a rousing success! This is proof positive of your progress, my dear. There is naught more for me to teach you. Your traineeship is complete.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: T-Truly!?

dialogue.name: LISETTE
dialogue.text: Now, I understand you owe much and more to our adventurer friend here. Do remember to express your gratitude. And even if you already have, no one has ever died from a glut of appreciation, is this not so?

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Thank you for your kind help, adventurer.

dialogue.name: ASTRID
dialogue.text: Er... K-Kind and fair adventurer, you have helped me more than you shall ever know. W-With every fiber of my being, I thank you, and...er, p-pray for your continued support as I strive to...to till the fields of love within people's hearts!
